title: Should I wear a mask in my county? CDC map shows COVID risk levels: Live COVID updates
description: The CDC announced new COVID-19 metrics Friday, which place most of the U.S. population in areas of low or medium risk of COVID. Latest COVID news.
content: More than two months after giving birth to her son, a 20-year-old New Hampshire woman who was critically ill with COVID-19 has recovered and was able to see him. In November, Macenzee Keller was hosp… [+7070 chars]
